verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> You וּבָנֶ֤יךָ <S%H1121><s%> Thou and thy sons וּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> and thy father's אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> for תִּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> with thee shall bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity הַמִּקְדָּ֑שׁ <S%H4720><s%> of the sanctuary וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> and you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thou and thy sons אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> for תִּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> with thee shall bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity כְּהֻנַּתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3550><s%> of your priesthood

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחֶיךָ֩ <S%H251><s%> And thy brethren מַטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> also of the tribe לֵוִ֜י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi שֵׁ֤בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the tribe אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> of thy father הַקְרֵ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> bring אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> for וְיִלָּו֥וּ <S%H3867><s%> thou with thee that they may be joined עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> with וִֽישָׁרְת֑וּךָ <S%H8334><s%> unto thee and minister וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> unto thee but thou and thy sons אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> for לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> with thee [shall minister] before אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <S%H5715><s%> of witness

וְשָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> And they shall keep מִֽשְׁמַרְתְּךָ֔ <S%H4931><s%> thy charge וּמִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <S%H4931><s%> and the charge כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> of all the tabernacle אַךְ֩ <S%H389><s%> also אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כְּלֵ֨י <S%H3627><s%> the vessels הַקֹּ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> and the altar לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יִקְרָ֔בוּ <S%H7126><s%> only they shall not come nigh וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or יָמֻ֥תוּ <S%H4191><s%> that neither they nor ye also die גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> both הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both אַתֶּֽם׃ <S%H859><s%> you

וְנִלְו֣וּ <S%H3867><s%> And they shall be joined עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> with וְשָֽׁמְר֗וּ <S%H8104><s%> unto thee and keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H4931><s%> the charge אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> for all עֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> for all the service הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle וְזָ֖ר <S%H2114><s%> and a stranger לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> may not יִקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> shall not come nigh אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H8104><s%> And ye shall keep אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the charge הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <S%H4931><s%> and the charge הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer קֶ֖צֶף <S%H7110><s%> that there be no wrath עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> any more upon the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> Myself הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ <S%H3947><s%> And I behold I have taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> your brethren הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לָכֶ֞ם מַתָּנָ֤ה <S%H4979><s%> [as] a gift נְתֻנִים֙ <S%H5414><s%> to you [they are] given לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD לַעֲבֹ֕ד <S%H5647><s%> to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> the service אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> Therefore thou and thy sons אִ֠תְּךָ <S%H854><s%> for תִּשְׁמְר֨וּ <S%H8104><s%> with thee shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּהֻנַּתְכֶ֜ם <S%H3550><s%> your priest's office לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything דְּבַ֧ר <S%H1697><s%> for every thing הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וּלְמִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and within לַפָּרֹ֖כֶת <S%H6532><s%> the vail וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֑ם <S%H5647><s%> and ye shall serve עֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> [unto you] as a service מַתָּנָ֗ה <S%H4979><s%> of gift אֶתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> I have given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּהֻנַּתְכֶ֔ם <S%H3550><s%> your priest's office וְהַזָּ֥ר <S%H2114><s%> and the stranger הַקָּרֵ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> approach יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> shall be put to death ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹן֒ <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> Myself הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> now behold נָתַ֣תִּֽי <S%H5414><s%> Behold I also have given לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <S%H4931><s%> thee the charge תְּרוּמֹתָ֑י <S%H8641><s%> of mine heave offerings לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קָדְשֵׁ֣י <S%H6918><s%> holy בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְךָ֨ נְתַתִּ֧ים <S%H5414><s%> unto thee have I given לְמָשְׁחָ֛ה <S%H4888><s%> them by reason of the anointing וּלְבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and to thy sons לְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> by an ordinance עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

זֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> This יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֛ מִקֹּ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> This shall be thine of the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy things מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> [reserved] from the fire כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every קָ֠רְבָּנָם <S%H7133><s%> every oblation לְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מִנְחָתָ֞ם <S%H4503><s%> of theirs every meat offering וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every חַטָּאתָ֗ם <S%H2403><s%> of theirs and every sin offering וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every אֲשָׁמָם֙ <S%H817><s%> of theirs and every trespass offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יָשִׁ֣יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> of theirs which they shall render לִ֔י קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> unto me [shall be] most קָֽדָשִׁ֥ים <S%H6944><s%> holy לְךָ֛ ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּלְבָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1121><s%> for thee and for thy sons

בְּקֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> In the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy תֹּאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H398><s%> [place] shalt thou eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָר֙ <S%H2145><s%> it every male יֹאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> shall eat אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> it it shall be holy יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָּֽךְ׃

וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> This לְּךָ֞ תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> And this [is] thine the heave offering מַתָּנָ֗ם <S%H4976><s%> of their gift לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תְּנוּפֹת֮ <S%H8573><s%> with all the wave offerings בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְךָ֣ נְתַתִּ֗ים <S%H5414><s%> I have given וּלְבָנֶ֧יךָ <S%H1121><s%> them unto thee and to thy sons וְלִבְנֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1323><s%> and to thy daughters אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> for לְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone טָה֥וֹר <S%H2889><s%> every one that is clean בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> in thy house יֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> shall eat אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> All חֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> All the best יִצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> of the oil וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> and all the best תִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> of the wine וְדָגָ֑ן <S%H1715><s%> and of the wheat רֵאשִׁיתָ֛ם <S%H7225><s%> the firstfruits אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> of them which they shall offer לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לְךָ֥ נְתַתִּֽים׃ <S%H5414><s%> them have I given

בִּכּוּרֵ֞י <S%H1061><s%> [And] whatsoever is first ripe כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּאַרְצָ֛ם <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יָבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> which they shall bring לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לְךָ֣ יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be yours כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone טָה֥וֹר <S%H2889><s%> shall be thine every one that is clean בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> in thine house יֹאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> shall eat
כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every חֵ֥רֶם <S%H2764><s%> Every thing devoted בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel לְךָ֥ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every פֶּ֣טֶר <S%H6363><s%> Every thing that openeth רֶ֠חֶם <S%H7358><s%> the matrix לְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּשָׂ֞ר <S%H1320><s%> in all flesh אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַקְרִ֧יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> which they bring לַֽיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בָּאָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> [whether it be] of men וּבַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> or beasts יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָּ֑ךְ אַ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H389><s%> nevertheless פָּדֹ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> shalt thou surely תִפְדֶּ֗ה <S%H6299><s%> redeem אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> shall be thine nevertheless the firstborn הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> בְּכֽוֹר־ <S%H1060><s%> and the firstling הַבְּהֵמָ֥ה <S%H929><s%> beasts הַטְּמֵאָ֖ה <S%H2931><s%> of unclean תִּפְדֶּֽה׃ <S%H6299><s%> shalt thou redeem

וּפְדוּיָו֙ <S%H6299><s%> And those that are to be redeemed מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> from a month תִּפְדֶּ֔ה <S%H6299><s%> shalt thou redeem בְּעֶ֨רְכְּךָ֔ <S%H6187><s%> according to thine estimation כֶּ֛סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for the money חֲמֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> of five שְׁקָלִ֖ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> which [is] twenty גֵּרָ֖ה <S%H1626><s%> gerahs הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> which

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> but בְּֽכוֹר־ <S%H1060><s%> But the firstling שׁ֡וֹר <S%H7794><s%> of a cow אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or בְכ֨וֹר <S%H1060><s%> or the firstling כֶּ֜שֶׂב <S%H3775><s%> of a sheep אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or בְכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> or the firstling עֵ֛ז <S%H5795><s%> of a goat לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִפְדֶּ֖ה <S%H6299><s%> thou shalt not redeem קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> they [are] holy הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמָ֞ם <S%H1818><s%> their blood תִּזְרֹ֤ק <S%H2236><s%> thou shalt sprinkle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶלְבָּ֣ם <S%H2459><s%> their fat תַּקְטִ֔יר <S%H6999><s%> and shalt burn אִשֶּׁ֛ה <S%H801><s%> [for] an offering made by fire לְרֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> for a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וּבְשָׂרָ֖ם <S%H1320><s%> And the flesh יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָּ֑ךְ כַּחֲזֵ֧ה <S%H2373><s%> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֛ה <S%H8573><s%> of them shall be thine as the wave וּכְשׁ֥וֹק <S%H7785><s%> shoulder הַיָּמִ֖ין <S%H3225><s%> and as the right לְךָ֥ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

כֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> All תְּרוּמֹ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> All the heave offerings הַקֳּדָשִׁ֗ים <S%H6944><s%> of the holy things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> offer בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַֽיהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD נָתַ֣תִּֽי <S%H5414><s%> have I given לְךָ֗ וּלְבָנֶ֧יךָ <S%H1121><s%> thee and thy sons וְלִבְנֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughters אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> for לְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever בְּרִית֩ <S%H1285><s%> it [is] a covenant מֶ֨לַח <S%H4417><s%> of salt עוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever הִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְךָ֖ וּלְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <S%H2233><s%> unto thee and to thy seed אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> for
